  • Uses of Figure in model

    Subclasses of Figure in model
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Bomb
    Class of objects thought to be the bombs of the game.
    class 
    BombFaster
    Particular bomb with fewer pre-explosion phases.
    class 
    BombRemote
    special bomb whose explosion is determined by the player's input and not by the transitory phases.
    class 
    BombStandard
    Standard bomb model.
    class 
    Fire
    The only Prop that have lethality true.
    class 
    Obstacle
    These Prop are breakable and solid.
    class 
    PowerUp
    Power Up class.
    class 
    Prop
    They are the objects use to be bundle to Tesserae.
    class 
    TesseraAbstract
    TesseraAbstract is the super type of each concrete Tessera.
    class 
    TesseraConcrete
    class of a concrete Tessera that can be instantiated.
    class 
    Wall
    These Prop are unbreakable and solid.
